items.sentence: Tom and Mary are both angry at me, aren't they?
Tom and Mary are approximately the same weight.
Tom and Mary are approximately the same height.
Tom and John showed me pictures of their wives.
Tom and John said they didn't want girlfriends.
Tom didn't want anything bad to happen to Mary.
Tom didn't have to tell Mary. She already knew.
Tom wanted to follow in his father's footsteps.
Tom turned off the light when he left the room.
Tom told me it was too hard for him to do that.
